defs: = ಗೋಮೇದಕ.
a sacrifice at the end of which a cow would be sacrificed.
= ಗೋಮೇದಕ.
a person who guards, protects or takes care of another person, property, etc.; a protector, a guardian.
to gather or scrape together with or as with a rake, spade or fingers.
to catch fish with a net or basket.
to take unlawfully from, esp. by force or threat of force; to rob; to plunder.
to make a mark on the surface with a pointed instrument, nail, etc.
to pour grain from above to blow the chaff by wind; to winnow.
to level the ploughed or turned up soil or make beds in a garden.
to inflict a wound or wounds (on or upon); to injure.
a kind of plant.
the plant Barleroa prionites of Acanthaceae family; thorny nail dye.
the plant Lawsonia inermis ( = L. alba) of Lythraceae family; a kind of henna plant, the leaves of which are used make a dye for decorating hands and feet.
the dye made from this plant.
one who tends and guards cows; a cowherd.
the plant Dregea volubilis ( = Marsdenia volubilis) of Asclepiadaceae family; cotton milk plant.
= ಗೋರಕ್ಷ - 1.
the care and raising of domesticated cattle; animal husbandry.
= ಗೋರಕ್ಷ - 2.
= ಗೋರಕ್ಷ - 2.
= ಗೋರಕ್ಷ - 2.
= ಗೋರಕ್ಷ - 2.
the tree Saymida febrifuga of Meliaceae family; bastard cedar; Indian redwood.
dust raised by cattle on the road while coming home in the evening.
evening, the time when the cattle return home, considered to be very auspicious time.
a carriage drawn by an ox or oxen.
Śiva, whose vehicle is Vřṣabha, the best of bulls.
cow's milk.
the liquid left after churning butter from milk; buttermilk.
the coagulated part of milk, from which cheese is made, formed when milk sours; curd.
having the colour of pure snow or milk; white.
having a light-coloured skin; of white complexion.
that which is of white complexion, and healthy, graceful form.
an excellent bull.
Nandi, the mythological bull, the vehicle of Śiva.
the moon.
Indra, the lord of gods.
(myth.) Varuṇa, the lord of water.
a number of cattle feeding, living or being driven together; a herd of cattle.
the potherb Amaranthus polygamus (=A. hypochondriacus) of Amaranthaceae family.
= ಗೋರಥ.
the act of attracting or fact of being attracted, as by charm, fascination or allure.
the act of hunting animals by enticing.
a song or music used by hunters to attract animals, esp. deer.
ಗೋರಿಯ ಮೃಗ gōriya mřga a wild animal enticed by a hunter.
a hole in the ground in which to bury a dead body; a grave.
a mound, monument made on it.

ಗೋರಿ ಮಾಡು gōri māḍu to put a dead body into the earth usu. in a ceremonial manner; to inter; to bury; 2. (fig.) to erase, remove, obliterate something; ತನ್ನ ಗೋರಿಯನ್ನು ತಾನೇ ತೋಡಿಕೊ tanna gōriyannu tānē tōḍiko (fig.) to cause one's own destruction; to spoil completely oneself.
a kind of animal.
a man of crooked or sadistic nature.
any of the birds Gracula religiosa, Acridotheres tristis, Eulabes religiosa, Tumenuchus pagodarum and Sturnopastor contra, a few of them are able to mimic the human voice, often kept as pet; myna.
= ಗೋರಿಕಲ್ಲು1.

a brilliant, hexagonally crystalline mineral, silicon dioxide, SiO2, (with principal constituent being ordinary sand), most often in a colourless, transparent form, but also sometimes in coloured varieties used as semiprecious stones; quartz.
a piece of any stone with sharp edge or edges.
a stone slab planted at the place where a dead person is buried.
the bean of the annual leguminous plant Cyamopsis tetragonoloba of Papilionaceae family; guar-bean.
= ಗೋರಿಕಲ್ಲು1.
= ಗೋರಿಗೊಳು.
to attract by charm, temptation etc.; to fascinate; to entice; to lure.
to lure an animal by singing a charming song (for catching or killing).
to inflict pain, suffering.
to put (the body of a dead) in the ground and cover with earth; to bury.
to be lured or enticed by the song of a hunter (said of animals being hunted).
to suffer pain; to be inflicted.
to gather by scraping together with or as with a rake, spade or fingers.
the plant Barleria longiflora of Acanthaceae family.

the largest, vegetarian, intelligent but shy, and most powerful of the great apes (Gorilla gorilla), native to the jungles of equatorial Africa; gorilla.
a kind of rectangular net for catching fish, by pulling both sides of it in shallow water.
a catching or killing a wild animal by alluring or decoying it into a trap.
to level the ploughed or turned up soil or make beds in a garden.

the act of drawing in or together, raking.
a small rake or a device with small teeth (usu. bent toward one side) at one end used for gathering dust, rubbish or for turning the material being cooked.
a very poor man.
to inflict pain, suffering; to cause to suffer.
the loud cry of a ox or cow.
an approximate unit of measure of distance (two haridāris).

a piece of board used for removing the excess of jaggery from the top of a mould.

a man of crooked or sadistic nature.
the excess jaggery removed from the top of a mould.
a kind of basket used to catch fish.

a bright yellow pigment prepared from the urine or bile of a cow or vomited by a cow in the form of scybala.
the potherb Amaranthus polygamus (=A. hypochondriacus) of Amaranthaceae family; (?).

= ಗೋರೋಚನ.

= ಗೋರಿಕಲ್ಲು1.
a kind of plant (Galega purpurea ?).
to utter a loud, rumbling sound, as in pain, anger, etc.

the mass of nerve tissue in the cranium of vertebrate animals, an enlarged extension of the spinal cord, being the main part of the nervous system, the centre of thought, and the organ that perceives sensory impulses and regulates motor impulses; the brain.
the state of being spherical.
any round body or figure having the surface equally distant from the centre at all points; a globe; a ball.
a plane figure bounded by a single curved line, every point of which is equally distant from the point at the centre of the figure; a circle.
the plant Xeromphis spinosa ( = Gardenia floribunda, = Randi dumetorum) of Rubiaceae family.
an illegitimate son of a widow.
(astrol.) the condition of six (according to some seven) planets being in the same house.
a soldier trained in the use of cannons, mounted heavy-guns, etc.; an artilleryman.
the branch of an army specialised in the use of heavy mounted guns; the artillery.

military branch or unit that orders, stores, and supplies ordnance; ordnance.

a rodent resembling the rat.
any round body or figure having the surface equally distant from the centre at all points; a globe; a ball.

any of the openings (as of sensory organs such as the eye, ear, nose, etc.) 3) the round, pigmented membrane surrounding the pupil of the eye, having muscles that adjust the size of the pupil to regulate the amount of light entering the eye; the iris.
an electric light bulb.
a closed box or a round container with a slit at the top for inserting monetary coins, used as a money box.
an illegitimate son of a widow.
a small ball, tablet, capsule, etc. of medicine usu. to be swallowed whole; a pill.
the churned curd.
a hemispherical roof or one formed by a series of rounded arches or vaults on a round or many-sided base; a large cupola; a dome.
a rounded lump or protuberance.

the act of inducing or trying to induce to do something; a seeking to persuade by flattery, soothing words, an ingratiating manner, etc.; coaxing.
ಗೋಲನ್ ಮಾಡು gōlan māḍu to influence or persuade (a person) by flattery, soothing words, coaxing, etc.; 2) (fig.) to make another act according to one's plan; to hypnotise.
a bitter, transparent, aromatic gum exuded from the bark of Commiphora plants; Myrrh.
the plant Mallotus philippensis ( = Rottlera tinctoria) of Euphorbiaceae family (?).
the tail of a cow.
a kind of monkey having a tail like a cow.

the shape that is round or globular.
(myst.) one of the many yogic spots or circles in the subtle body of human, by activating which by yogic techniques, one achieves some superhuman powers.

half of a sphere, globe or celestial body, esp. - a) any of the halves into which the celestial sphere is divided by either the celestial equator or the ecliptic; b) any of the halves of the earth (either north or south); a hemisphere.
anything that is in the shape of a ball.
a little ball of stone, glass or clay, used in games.
a small ball or cone-shaped missile of lead, metal alloy, etc., to be shot from a firearm; a bullet.

ಗೋಲಿ ಆಟ gōli āṭa a children's game in which a marble is propelled by a finger at other marbles, usu. in an attempt to drive them out of a marked circle; 2. a work, undertaking that is, considered to be or neglected as a trivial or easy.
in football game, a player stationed at a goal to prevent the ball from entering it; a goal-keeper.
the plant Nyctanthes arbor-tristis of Oleaceae family.
its flower.
a children's game in which the loser propels the marble by the back of the palm with fingers folded.

the act or fact of the rein of a horse being pulled by the rider to control the animal.
(dial.) a kind of sari (a long, unsewn cloth worn by women) that is worn without tucking the one end behind at the waist , passing between the legs.
in football game, the space between two poles set at the opposite ends of a field through which or a net into which the ball must be passed to score; the goal.
the score so made.
(myth.) one of the several higher regions, a part of heaven.

its root; sweet flag-root.

a very small, short pipe made of gold, stringed to a necklace.

the use of charms, spells, and rituals in seeking or pretending to cause or control events or govern certain natural or supernatural forces; magic.

a small region on the west coast of India having an area of 1,350 sq. mi. (3,496 sq. km) and since 1962, it is formed as a Union Territory (with Daman & Diu and called Goa, Daman, and Diu), with a total area of 3,813 sq. km; ಗೋವೆಯ ಸಣ್ಣ gōveya saṇṇa a variety of fine rice.
the tropical tree Anacardium occidentale of Anacardiaceae family, valued for its kidney-shaped seeds; cashew.

the branch of medicine dealing with the prevention and treatment of diseases and injuries in cattle; veterinary science.

a building for cows; a cowshed.

sound esp. one of a loud proclamation, announcement, etc.
an enclosed yard, building for cattle; a cow-pen.

a kind of lizard, (Lacerta cristata/Chamaeles vulgaris) belonging to the Chamaeleontidae family, with an angular head, prehensile tail, eyes that move independently of each other, the ability to change skin colour rapidly, and a long, agile tongue for catching prey; a chameleon.
